result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lashun Tyhern McGee Sr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee Sr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait appeared by video for Lashun Tyhern McGee Sr.  Attorney Tristan Bednarek appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a plea and sentencing hearing. Defense counsel requests an adjourned plea and sentencing hearing. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee Sr not in court, in custody.  Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait appeared by video for Lashun Tyhern McGee Sr.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for Plea/Sentencing Hearing. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel requests an adjournment, due to reasons put forth on the record. No objections from the State. Court grants request. Case adjourned to Br 29.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Letter from defendant re:  attending upcoming hearing via ZOOM.  (Lashun T. McGee, Sr. - #205065, Dodge Correctional Institution, PO Box 700, Waupun WI 53963-0700).

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a final pre-trial. Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing hearing. Court vacates the jury trial on 7/11/22.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.
State's Witness List, received and filed.
State's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a final pre-trial.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Parties request an adjourned final pre-trial.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
MATTER HEARD OFF THE RECORD.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29. This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel requests an additional scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel requests an additional scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Letter from defendant.  (Lashun T. McGee, Sr. - #2022000041, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee not in court, in custody.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Pre-trial conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defense counsel still needs discovery and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Amarilys C.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee in court with attorney Paige Aleece Styler.  Defendant Lashun Tyhern McGee in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Lashun Tyhern McGee appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
